title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second columns could be merged.
OB: The marking between the button and the list is too large. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top. The table does not have a label. Multiple selection is not allowed. The signature preview is not a label and does not wrap. The signature preview does not have the background color set to the same color as a hover.
EB: The marking between the button and the list should be reduced. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top. The table should have a label. Multiple selection should be allowed. The signature preview should be a label that wraps. The signature preview should have the background color set to the same color as a hover.
